response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing the return on my investment. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and provides a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
